TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessagePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Represents data that is passed locally with a custom message type but not serialized into a SOAP message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessagePropertyAttribute> attribute to attach data to the custom message type as it passes through the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system without serializing the data into a SOAP message.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessagePropertyAttribute> attribute.
[!code-csharp[messagepropertyattribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messagepropertyattribute/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[messagepropertyattribute#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messagepropertyattribute/vb/source.vb#0)]
